ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COM ITTEE--- TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed I Additional Financing (Ebola Emergency Response Project) to the Republic of Sierra Leone The undersigned Committke constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Developm nt Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect oi the proposal that the Association extend to the Republic of Sierra Leone (the Recipient) an additional fi iancing in an amount equivalent to SDR 66,300,000. The purpose of said additional financing is to provide additional funds to supplement the financial assistance furnished by the Association under the Financing Agreement (Ebola Emergency Response Project, Grant No, H992-SL), dated September 17, 2014, between R public of Sierra Leone and the Association. 1. The Committee has carefull, studied the merits of the proposal to extend such an additional financing, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the additional financing are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project in support of which the proceeds of such additional financing are to be applied continues to come within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and tha said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Sierra Leone and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Sierra Leone. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that the said Project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends aid project for such assistance.
ï»¿Republic of Sierra Leone - 2 - Additional Financing for Ebola Erergency Response Project COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by the Governor for the Republic of Sierra Leone gional Vice President Africa Dated at Washington, D.C.
